name: Salted Caramel Core
subhead: Sweet Cream Ice Cream with Blonde Brownies & a Salted Caramel Core
description: Find your way to the ultimate ice cream experience with our Cores. Whether your primal urges lead you to the center of salted caramel or directly to the blonde brownies, you’ll be in total control of your own ice cream destiny.
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, LIQUID SUGAR (SUGAR, WATER), WATER, BROWN SUGAR, SUGAR, MILK, WHEAT FLOUR, EGG YOLKS, CORN SYRUP, EGGS, BUTTER (CREAM, SALT), BUTTEROIL, PECTIN, SEA SALT, SOYBEAN OIL, VANILLA EXTRACT, GUAR GUM, SOY LECITHIN, BAKING POWDER (SODIUM ACID PYROPHOSPHATE, SODIUM BICARBONATE, CORN STARCH, MONOCALCIUM PHOSPHATE), BAKING SODA, SALT, CARRAGEENAN, LACTASE

name: Berry Sweet Mascarpone
subhead: Blackberry & Mascarpone Ice Creams with Shortbread Cookies & Fudge-Covered Almonds
description: From the sweet blackberry and crazy creamy mascarpone ice creams to the shortbread cookies and fudge-dunked almonds, you’ll fall in love with this flavor faster than you can say “mass-car-po-nay.”
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, WATER, LIQUID SUGAR (SUGAR, WATER), ROASTED ALMONDS (ALMONDS, PEANUT OIL), DRIED CANE SYRUP, EGG YOLKS, WHEAT FLOUR, COCONUT OIL, BLACKBERRY JUICE CONCENTRATE, BUTTER (CREAM, SALT), SUGAR, COCOA, SOYBEAN OIL, CORN SYRUP, SALT, BUTTEROIL, SOY LECITHIN, VANILLA EXTRACT, EGGS, GUAR GUM, MILK, NATURAL FLAVORS, BAKING SODA, TAPIOCA STARCH, CARRAGEENAN, LACTIC ACID, CITRIC ACID

name: Boots on the Moooo’n™
subhead: A Universe of Milk Chocolate Ice Cream with Fudge Cows & Toffee Meteor Clusters Orbiting a Sugar Cookie Dough Core
description: While Space Force works to get boots (back) on the moon, this cosmic concoction will launch your dreams into orbit. With fudgy astronaut cows & toffee meteors, space couldn't be any sweeter. Unless the moon was made out of sugar cookie dough. Which for this limited-time flavor, it actually is!

name: Bourbon Pecan Pie
subhead: Buttery Bourbon Ice Cream with Pecans, Shortbread Cookie Pieces & a Whiskey Caramel Swirl
description: Not long ago we scoop-toured through Texas asking you to elect the best of two Texas-inspired flavors. Thanks to you this bourbon-y whirl of pecans and cookies wrapped in whiskey-kissed caramel is now available Tex-clusively!
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, LIQUID SUGAR (SUGAR, WATER), WATER, CORN SYRUP, PECANS, BUTTER (CREAM, SALT), WHEAT FLOUR, EGG YOLKS, SUGAR, DRIED CANE SYRUP, WHISKEY, DRY MALT EXTRACT (BARLEY), SOYBEAN OIL, SALT, EGGS, CARAMEL COLOR, PEANUT OIL, GUAR GUM, BAKING SODA, CARRAGEENAN, SOY LECITHIN. MAY CONTAIN OTHER TREE NUTS

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
subhead: Caramel Cheesecake Ice Cream with Cheesecake Pieces & Chocolate Cookie Swirls
description: In your cheesecake dreams, is it like you’re spooning through a world of caramel cheesecake ice cream swirled with chocolate cookies in a wonderland filled with chunks of cheesecake? Hello? You can wake up now…
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, WATER, LIQUID SUGAR (SUGAR, WATER), SUGAR, CORN SYRUP, CANOLA OIL, CREAM CHEESE (PASTEURIZED MILK, CREAM, CHEESE CULTURES, SALT, CAROB BEAN GUM), COCONUT OIL, EGG YOLKS, WHEAT FLOUR, DRIED CANE SYRUP, SOYBEAN OIL, GRAHAM FLOUR, EGGS, COCOA (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), NATURAL FLAVORS, COCOA, GUAR GUM, BUTTEROIL, MILK PROTEIN CONCENTRATE, CORN STARCH, SALT, SOY LECITHIN, TAPIOCA STARCH, PECTIN, CARAMELIZED SUGAR SYRUP, BAKING SODA, MOLASSES, HONEY, CARRAGEENAN, VANILLA EXTRACT

name: Cherry Garcia®
subhead: Cherry Ice Cream with Cherries & Fudge Flakes
description: Our euphorically edible tribute to guitarist Jerry Garcia & Grateful Dead fans everywhere, it’s the first ice cream named for a rock legend and the most famous of our fan-suggested flavors.
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, LIQUID SUGAR (SUGAR, WATER), WATER, CHERRIES, SUGAR, EGG YOLKS, COCONUT OIL, COCOA (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), FRUIT AND VEGETABLE CONCENTRATES (COLOR), COCOA POWDER, GUAR GUM, NATURAL FLAVORS, LEMON JUICE CONCENTRATE, CARRAGEENAN, MILK FAT, SOY LECITHIN

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
subhead: Vanilla Ice Cream with Gobs of Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
description: We knew we were onto something big when we made the world’s first batch of Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough ice cream in 1984. Today the flavor still reigns among our all-time most popular concoctions.
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, LIQUID SUGAR (SUGAR, WATER), WATER, WHEAT FLOUR, SUGAR, BROWN SUGAR, EGG YOLKS, BUTTER (CREAM, SALT), EXPELLER PRESSED SOYBEAN OIL, EGGS, COCONUT OIL, CHOCOLATE LIQUOR, VANILLA EXTRACT, COCOA (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), COCOA POWDER, SALT, MOLASSES, GUAR GUM, COCOA BUTTER, NATURAL FLAVOR, CARRAGEENAN, MILK FAT, SOY LECITHIN

name: Chocolate Shake It™
subhead: Chocolate Malt Milkshake Ice Cream With Salted Fudge Pieces & Marshmallow Swirls
description: For those who prefer their ice cream shaken & swirled here’s a chocolate malt milkshake and marshmallow creation we topped off with euphoric morsels of salted fudge. Enjoy!
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, LIQUID SUGAR (SUGAR, WATER), WATER, CORN SYRUP, WHEAT FLOUR, POWDERED SUGAR (CANE SUGAR, CORNSTARCH), SUGAR, EGG YOLKS, COCOA (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), BUTTER (CREAM, SALT), BARLEY MALT, TAPIOCA SYRUP, EGG WHITES, MILK, COCOA, SEA SALT, GUAR GUM, NATURAL FLAVOR, PECTIN, VANILLA EXTRACT, ENZYMES, CARRAGEENAN, SALT, BAKING SODA

name: Chunky Monkey®
subhead: Banana Ice Cream with Fudge Chunks & Walnuts
description: To create a flavor as fun as the name, we monkeyed around with bunches of test batches until we knew we had a winner: the nuttiest chocolatey-chunkiest concoction-gone-bananas you'll ever go ape for.
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, LIQUID SUGAR (SUGAR, WATER), WATER, SUGAR, WALNUTS, BANANA PUREE, COCONUT OIL, EGG YOLKS, COCOA (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), COCOA POWDER, LEMON JUICE CONCENTRATE, GUAR GUM, NATURAL FLAVORS, MILK FAT, CARRAGEENAN, SOY LECITHIN, VANILLA EXTRACT

name: Cinnamon Buns®
subhead: Caramel Ice Cream with Cinnamon Bun Dough & a Cinnamon Streusel Swirl
description: Our cool salute to cinnamon buns is so cinnamon-streuseled & dough-loaded, there's no telling where the cinnamon buns end or the ice cream begins. That's because it's one fun flavor all the way through. Enjoy!
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, WATER, LIQUID SUGAR (SUGAR, WATER), SUGAR, DRIED CANE SYRUP, WHEAT FLOUR, CORN SYRUP, EGG YOLKS, BROWN SUGAR, SOYBEAN OIL, BUTTER (CREAM, SALT), SPICE, COCONUT OIL, MOLASSES, SALT, SOY LECITHIN, SODIUM BICARBONATE, VANILLA EXTRACT, GUAR GUM, CARRAGEENAN

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!®
subhead: Coffee Ice Cream with Espresso Bean Fudge Chunks
description: Somewhere between the creamy coffee coffee ice cream & the buzzbuzzbuzz of espresso fudge, it hits you: you’re wide awake & in lovelovelove.
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, LIQUID SUGAR (SUGAR, WATER), WATER, SUGAR, COCONUT OIL, COFFEE EXTRACT, EGG YOLKS, COCOA (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), COFFEE, COCOA POWDER, SOY LECITHIN, GUAR GUM, VANILLA EXTRACT, CARRAGEENAN

name: Cold Brew Caramel Latte
subhead: Cold Brew & Sweet Cream Ice Creams with Salted Caramel Swirls
description: If you’ve been looking for a more chillacious way to get your Ben & Jerry’s on, this dreamy latte-inspired ice cream made with cold brew coffee, rich sweet cream, & salt-kissed caramel is a mighty cool & euphoric motorvator.
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, WATER, LIQUID SUGAR (SUGAR, WATER), CORN SYRUP, EGG YOLKS, SUGAR, BUTTER (CREAM, SALT), COFFEE, SEA SALT, GUAR GUM, CARAMELIZED SUGAR SYRUP, CARRAGEENAN, BAKING SODA

name: Milk & Cookies
subhead: Vanilla Ice Cream with a Chocolate Cookie Swirl, Chocolate Chip & Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: How do you take classic milk-&-cookie goodness to a whole 'nother level of greatness? We don’t really know what that means, but we know this flavor’s loaded with the most euphoric assortment of cookies we ever dunked, chunked & swirled in our ice cream.
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, LIQUID SUGAR (SUGAR, WATER), WATER, SUGAR, WHEAT FLOUR, CANOLA OIL, EGG YOLKS, BROWN SUGAR, BUTTER (CREAM, SALT), COCOA (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), COCOA, COCONUT OIL, CHOCOLATE LIQUOR, SOYBEAN OIL, EGGS, SALT, NATURAL FLAVORS, VANILLA EXTRACT, TAPIOCA STARCH, GUAR GUM, HONEY, BAKING SODA, COCOA BUTTER, SOY LECITHIN, VANILLA BEANS, CARRAGEENAN

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie
subhead: Peppermint Ice Cream with Chocolate Sandwich Cookies
description: In case you’ve ever wondered what makes this wintry flavor so wicked cool to luge a spoon through: it’s the pepperminty excellence we packed in it, not to mention all those chocolate sandwich cookie moguls. Enjoy!

name: Oat of This Swirled™
subhead: Buttery Brown Sugar Ice Cream with Fudge Flakes & Oatmeal Cinnamon Cookie Swirls
description: When’s the best time to enjoy this blissful mix of brown sugar ice cream with otherworldly swirls of cinnamony oatmeal cookies? Any time between breakfast and bed, from now ‘til whenever.

name: Peanut Butter Cup
subhead: Peanut Butter Ice Cream with Peanut Butter Cups
description: We interrupt our regularly scheduled programming to remind you how much you love ice cream that’s perfectly peanut buttery & peanut butter cuppity at the same time.
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, LIQUID SUGAR (SUGAR, WATER), WATER, PEANUTS, SUGAR, COCONUT OIL, EGG YOLKS, PARTIALLY DEFATTED PEANUT FLOUR, PEANUT OIL, MILK, COCOA (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), SALT, GUAR GUM, COCOA, NATURAL FLAVOR, SOY LECITHIN, VANILLA EXTRACT, CARRAGEENAN

name: Peanut Butter World®
subhead: Milk Chocolate Ice Cream with Peanut Buttery Swirls & Chocolate Cookie Swirls
description: \What makes Ben & Jerry's so euphoric? Some say it's the legendary creamy-richness of our flavor creations. Others say it's the tastebud-boggling combinations of spoon-bending chunks & perfect swirls. We say
rating_by_reviews: CREAM, LIQUID SUGAR (SUGAR, WATER), SKIM MILK, WATER, PEANUTS, SUGAR, COCOA (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), CANOLA OIL, PEANUT OIL, WHEAT FLOUR, COCOA, COCONUT OIL, EGG YOLKS, SALT, TAPIOCA STARCH, GUAR GUM, NATURAL FLAVORS, SOY LECITHIN, BAKING SODA, CARRAGEENAN

name: Pistachio Pistachio
subhead: Pistachio Ice Cream with Lightly Roasted Pistachios
description: The name alone shows how much we love pistachios. But don't just take our word for it - let the flavor speak for itself!
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, LIQUID SUGAR (SUGAR, WATER), WATER, PISTACHIOS, EGG YOLKS, SUGAR, COCONUT OIL, GUAR GUM, SALT, NATURAL FLAVORS, CARRAGEENAN

name: S'mores
subhead: Chocolate Ice Cream with Fudge Chunks, Toasted Marshmallow & Graham Cracker Swirls
description: Remember when cookouts & campfires kindled your cravings for s'mores, glorious s’mores? We loaded this flavor with all the stuff that makes s’mores so glorious, so you can kindle your cravings whenever, no campfires required.

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
subhead: Strawberry Cheesecake Ice Cream with Strawberries & a Thick Graham Cracker Swirl
description: For strawberry cheesecake lovers who’ve always wanted to have their cheesecake & scoop it, too, we’ve created a flavor jam-packed with strawberry cheesecake-greatness & a fantastic graham-cracker swirl.

name: Vanilla
subhead: Vanilla Ice Cream
description: When you dig into this pint, you’ll find a rich, creamy Vanilla that’s more vanilla-tasting than any Vanilla you’ve ever tasted.
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, LIQUID SUGAR (SUGAR, WATER), WATER, EGG YOLKS, SUGAR, GUAR GUM, VANILLA EXTRACT, VANILLA BEANS, CARRAGEENAN

name: Vanilla Caramel Fudge
subhead: Vanilla Ice Cream with Swirls of Caramel & Fudge
description: If you’ve been looking for reasons to try something chunkless, this container holds a Vanilla-rich, fudge-luscious & caramel-gooey pintful of them. Enjoy!
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, LIQUID SUGAR (SUGAR, WATER), WATER, CORN SYRUP, SUGAR, BUTTER (CREAM, SALT), EGG YOLKS, VANILLA EXTRACT, COCOA (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), SALT, CARRAGEENAN, CHOCOLATE LIQUOR, GUAR GUM, BAKING SODA

name: Boom Chocolatta™ Cookie Core
subhead: Mocha & Caramel Ice Creams with Chocolate Cookies, Fudge Flakes & a Chocolate Cookie Core
description: As you slam dunk your spoon through creamy mocha & caramel to celebrate the epic chocolate cookie-spread core, your technique may not be perfect, but the victory’s perfectly delicious.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core
subhead: Cookie Milk Ice Cream with Fudge Chips & a Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core
description: Our latest cookie dough creation is boldly loaded like never before, with ice cream that tastes like a just-dunked-cookie, & an epic core of chocolate-chippity dough where no dough has ever been.
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, WATER, LIQUID SUGAR (SUGAR, WATER), SUGAR, SOYBEAN OIL, EGG YOLKS, WHEAT FLOUR, COCONUT OIL, CHOCOLATE CHIPS (SUGAR, UNSWEETENED CHOCOLATE, COCOA BUTTER, SOY LECITHIN, NATURAL FLAVOR), BUTTER (CREAM, SALT), COCOA (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), CORN SYRUP, NATURAL FLAVOR, COCOA POWDER, EGGS, MOLASSES, SALT, GUAR GUM, BROWN SUGAR, CHOCOLATE LIQUOR, VANILLA EXTRACT, SOY LECITHIN, CARRAGEENAN, BAKING SODA, COCOA BUTTER

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
subhead: Sweet Cream Ice Cream with a hint of Almond flavor & Shortbread Cookies & Cherry Ice Cream with Cherries & a Sugar Cookie Dough Core
description: Instead of just giving you some sugar cookie dough, we thought you’d enjoy a core full even more, enwrapped in almond-kissed sweet cream & cherry ice creams packed with cookies & cherries. Do we love you or what?
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, WATER, LIQUID SUGAR (SUGAR, WATER), SUGAR, CHERRIES, SOYBEAN OIL, WHEAT FLOUR, EGG YOLKS, BUTTER (CREAM, SALT), DRIED CANE SYRUP, EGGS, NATURAL FLAVOR, COCONUT OIL, SALT, GUAR GUM, FRUIT AND VEGETABLE CONCENTRATES (COLOR), LEMON JUICE CONCENTRATE, CARRAGEENAN, BAKING SODA, ALMOND EXTRACT

name: Brownie Batter Core

description: Spooning your way to brownie nirvana? Smack dab in the middle of this brownie-chunk-filled ice cream there's a core of unbaked brownie batter calling your name. No, really. We heard it.

name: Karamel Sutra® Core

description: Find your way to the ultimate ice cream experience with our Cores. Whether your primal urges lead you to the center of soft caramel or directly to the fudge chips, you’ll be in total control of your own ice cream destiny.
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, LIQUID SUGAR (SUGAR, WATER), WATER, SUGAR, MILK, CORN SYRUP, COCOA (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), EGG YOLKS, COCONUT OIL, BUTTER (CREAM, SALT), COCOA POWDER, MILK FAT, PECTIN, GUAR GUM, BAKING SODA, LACTASE, SOY LECITHIN, VANILLA EXTRACT, SALT, CARRAGEENAN, MILKFAT, NATURAL FLAVOR

name: Peanut Butter Fudge Core

name: Bourbon Praline Pecan Ice Cream
description: Treat yourself to ice cream infused with smooth Bourbon sprinkled with brown sugar and given the perfect crunch with praline pecans.

name: Butter Pecan Ice Cream
description: An American classic, revisited with our passion for singular flavor. We blend spoonful after spoonful of buttery roasted pecans with pure, sweet cream to create a delight like no other.

name: Chocolate Soft Dipped Ice Cream Bar
description: Introducing New Soft Dipped Chocolate Ice Cream Bars. A decadent pairing of rich chocolate ice cream covered in a soft chocolate truffle coating.

name: Chocolate Dark Chocolate Ice Cream Bar
description: Between the classic rich and creamy chocolate ice cream inside, and the thick and crunchy dark chocolate coating finely drizzled on the outside, this is a chocolate connoisseur's delight.
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, SUGAR, COCOA PROCESSED WITH ALKALI, DARK CHOCOLATE, SUGAR, CHOCOLATE, SOY LECITHIN, VANILLA EXTRACT, COCONUT OIL, SOYBEAN OIL

name: Chocolate Peanut Butter Ice Cream
description: We start with our legendary chocolate ice cream and swirl in ribbons of creamy, smooth peanut butter. The experience is an irresistible blend of flavors in every delicious mouthful.

name: Coconut Caramel Dark Chocolate Non-Dairy Bar
description: Velvety coconut cream is swirled with ribbons of luscious caramel sauce, then dipped in dark chocolate and finished with a rich, dark chocolate drizzle. It raises the bar for non-dairy and vegan indulgence.
ingredients: COCONUT CREAM, COCONUT EXTRACT, WATER, CORN SYRUP, WATER, SUGAR, DARK CHOCOLATE, SUGAR, CHOCOLATE, SOY LECITHIN, VANILLA EXTRACT, COCONUT OIL, BROWN SUGAR, COCONUT CREAM, COCONUT EXTRACT, WATER, WATER, COCONUT OIL, PECTIN, SALT

name: Coffee Ice Cream

name: Dulce de Leche Ice Cream
description: Inspired by Latin America's treasured dessert, our dulce de leche ice cream is a delicious combination of caramel and sweet cream, swirled with ribbons of golden caramel.

ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, SUGAR, CORN SYRUP, COCOA PROCESSED WITH ALKALI, EGG YOLKS, CORN STARCH, SAFFLOWER OIL, EGG WHITES, CREAM OF TARTAR, SALT, PECTIN, NATURAL FLAVOR

name: Strawberry Waffle Cone HEAVEN Light Ice Cream
description: Introducing new HEAVEN Strawberry Waffle Cone light ice cream. Delight in the sweet taste of strawberry light ice cream dappled with crunchy pieces of chocolate-covered waffle cone.
ingredients: CANE SUGAR, SKIM MILK, STRAWBERRIES, CREAM, CHOCOLATY COATED CONE PIECES, COCONUT OIL, CANE SUGAR, WAFFLE CONE PIECES, WHEAT FLOUR, CANE SUGAR, SOYBEAN OIL, SOY LECITHIN, NATURAL FLAVOR, SALT, COCOA PROCESSED WITH ALKALI, VANILLA EXTRACT, EGG YOLKS, PECTIN, VITAMIN A PALMITATE

name: Vanilla Ice Cream
description: Vanilla is the essence of elegance and sophistication. This marriage of pure, sweet cream and Madagascar vanilla creates the sweet scent of exotic spice and a distinctive taste that lingers on your tongue.
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, CANE SUGAR, EGG YOLKS, VANILLA EXTRACT

name: Vanilla Soft Dipped Ice Cream Bar
description: Introducing Soft Dipped Ice Cream Bars, a luscious combination of creamy vanilla ice cream covered in a soft chocolate truffle coating - the ultimate luxurious taste sensation.
ingredients: VANILLA ICE CREAM: CREAM, SKIM MILK, SUGAR, EGG YOLKS, VANILLA EXTRACT. CHOCOLATY COATING: SUGAR, COCOA PROCESSED WITH ALKALI, CANOLA OIL, PALM OIL, SOY LECITHIN.

name: Vanilla Bean Ice Cream
description: a unique twist to our iconic flavor. our ice cream blends Madagascar vanilla and pure, sweet cream with flecks of real vanilla beans, for a spicy and sweet delight.
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, CANE SUGAR, EGG YOLKS, GROUND VANILLA BEANS, VANILLA EXTRACT

name: Vanilla Blackberry Chocolate TRIO CRISPY LAYERS
description: It begins with the classic taste of pure vanilla ice cream then, one layer of crispy Belgian chocolate later, becomes the vine-ripened intensity of blackberry ice cream.
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, CANE SUGAR, EGG YOLKS, CREAM, SKIM MILK, CANE SUGAR, EGG YOLKS, NATURAL FLAVOR, LEMON JUICE CONCENTRATE, SUGAR, COCONUT OIL, SOY LECITHIN

name: Vanilla Caramel White Chocolate TRIO CRISPY LAYERS
description: This incredible combination of tastes and textures combines layers of vanilla and caramel ice cream with crunchy white chocolate and sweet caramel sauce.
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, SUGAR, SWEETENED CONDENSED MILK, CONDENSED MILK, SUGAR, CORN SYRUP, EGG YOLKS, CARAMELIZED SUGAR, SUGAR, WATER, SEA SALT, BAKING SODA, SOY LECITHIN, VANILLA EXTRACT, CREAM, SKIM MILK, SUGAR, EGG YOLKS, SUGAR, COCOA BUTTER, NONFAT DRY MILK, COCONUT OIL, SKIM MILK, SOY LECITHIN, CORN SYRUP, SWEETENED CONDENSED MILK, CONDENSED MILK, SUGAR, CREAM, SUGAR, WATER, BUTTER, CREAM, SALT, SALT, PECTIN, SOY LECITHIN

name: Vanilla Milk Chocolate Almond Ice Cream Bar
description: We start with pure, sweet vanilla and blend it with sweet, fresh cream to make our incredibly smooth vanilla ice cream. Then we dip it in a crunchy roasted almond and milk chocolate coating.
ingredients: CREAM, SKIM MILK, SUGAR, EGG YOLKS, MILK CHOCOLATE, SUGAR, WHOLE MILK POWDER, CHOCOLATE, COCOA BUTTER, SOY LECITHIN, VANILLA EXTRACT, ALMONDS ROASTED IN VEGETABLE OIL, SAFFLOWER OIL, COCONUT OIL

name: White Chocolate Raspberry Ice Cream Bar
description: Inspired by a familiar favorite, this bar of smooth white chocolate ice cream with swirls of tart raspberry is dipped in milk chocolate and then sprinkled with dark chocolate. Perfect for getting carried away.
ingredients: WHITE CHOCOLATE ICE CREAM, CREAM, SKIM MILK, SUGAR, EGG YOLKS, COCOA BUTTER, NATURAL FLAVOR, MILK CHOCOLATE AND VEGETABLE OIL COATING, MILK CHOCOLATE, SUGAR, WHOLE MILK POWDER, CHOCOLATE, COCOA BUTTER, SOY LECITHIN, VANILLA EXTRACT, COCONUT OIL, RASPBERRY SWIRL, RASPBERRY PUREE, SUGAR, WATER, LEMON JUICE CONCENTRATE, PECTIN, NATURAL FLAVOR, DARK CHOCOLATE, SUGAR, CHOCOLATE, SOY LECITHIN, VANILLA EXTRACT, COCONUT OIL, SOYBEAN OIL

name: ALPHONSO MANGO SORBETTO
description: Our simple and delicious Alphonso Mango Sorbetto is made with the finest ripe mangoes of Maharashtra, pure sugar, and fresh lemon. It’s the perfect dairy-free and vegan treat that everyone can enjoy.
ingredients: MANGOS, WATER, SUGAR, DEXTROSE, LEMON JUICE, CAROB BEAN GUM

name: BELGIAN CHOCOLATE GELATO
description: Our Belgian Chocolate gelato is made with melted, imported Belgian chocolate blended until smooth with fresh milk, cream, eggs and a hint of vanilla. When it comes to chocolate gelato, there’s good, there’s better, and there’s Belgian.
ingredients: MILK, SUGAR, CREAM, EGG AND EGG YOLK, DEXTROSE, CHOCOLATE, COCOA (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), COCOA BUTTER, CHOCOLATE, CAROB GUM, SOY LECITHIN, NATURAL FLAVOR

name: CARAMEL COOKIE CRUNCH GELATO
description: This is one of our best-selling flavors that people can’t get enough of (and we don’t blame them)! In our Caramel Cookie Crunch gelato recipe, we blend chocolate cookies into our delicious sweet cream gelato, then add a swirl of our one-of-a-kind dulce de leche. This caramelly combo results in one of our finest flavors to-date that will keep you coming back for more.
ingredients: MILK, SUGAR, CREAM, SKIM MILK, COCONUT, PALM AND SOYBEAN OILS, DEXTROSE, COCOA (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), ENRICHED FLOUR (WHEAT FLOUR, NIACIN, REDUCED IRON, THIAMIN MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID), CORN SYRUP, SUNFLOWER LECITHIN, CAROB BEAN GUM, VANILLA EXTRACT, GUAR GUM, BAKING SODA, DRIED CANE SYRUP, COCOA, SOY LECITHIN, NATURAL FLAVOR, CORN STARCH, SALT

name: CHOCOLATE CHERRY CHEESECAKE
description: Cherry cheesecake is a classic dessert and we think our Chocolate Cherry Cheesecake Layer is a soon-to-be classic, as well. We started with a cheesecake gelato made with real cream cheese to taste exactly like cheesecake. In the second indulgent layer we added chocolate flakes to create a decadent texture. We followed this with a third layer of black cherry sauce made with U.S. grown black cherries. Next, we included another layer of cheesecake gelato. Finally, to replicate classic graham cracker crust, we crafted a fifth layer of graham cookie pieces.
ingredients: MILK, SUGAR, CREAM CHEESE (CREAM, MILK, CHEESE CULTURE, SALT, GUAR GUM, CAROB BEAN GUM, XANTHAN GUM), CREAM, CHOCOLATE, EGG YOLKS AND EGG WHITES, WHEAT FLOUR, WATER, DEXTROSE, CHERRY PUREE, CHERRY JUICE CONCENTRATE, COCONUT OIL, MILK FAT, COCOA BUTTER, WHEAT BRAN, LEMON JUICE CONCENTRATE, CHOCOLATE PROCESSED WITH ALKALI, NATURAL FLAVOR, HONEY, VANILLA EXTRACT, CAROB BEAN GUM, SOY LECITHIN, BAKING SODA, SALT, WHEAT GERM

name: CHOCOLATE CHIP COOKIE DOUGH GELATO
description: We begin with our vanilla gelato, add chocolate chip cookie dough pieces, then finish with bonus swirls of fudge, resulting in this gelato that’s a nostalgic blend of child and adulthood.
ingredients: MILK, SUGAR, CREAM, WHEAT FLOUR, DEXTROSE, SKIM MILK, CHOCOLATE LIQUOR, VANILLA EXTRACT, EGGS, COCOA (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), MOLASSES, SOYBEAN OIL, CAROB BEAN GUM, RICE FLOUR, NATURAL FLAVOR, SALT, COCOA BUTTER, LEMON PEEL, SOY LECITHIN

name: CHOCOLATE PEANUT BUTTER CUP GELATO
description: Milk chocolate gelato shares the stage with peanut butter and mini peanut butter cups to create our chocolate peanut butter cup gelato. Best-tasting party ever? We’d say “yes,” but our mouths are full.
ingredients: MILK, SUGAR, PEANUTS, CREAM, EGG AND EGG YOLK, DEXTROSE, COCONUT OIL, CHOCOLATE, COCOA (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), COCOA BUTTER, SKIM MILK, SALT, CAROB BEAN GUM, SOY LECITHIN, NATURAL FLAVOR, COCOA, VANILLA EXTRACT

name: COCONUT CHOCOLATE COOKIE
ingredients: WATER, SUGAR, DESICCATED COCONUT, COCONUT OIL, WHEAT FLOUR, DEXTROSE, COCOA PROCESSED WITH ALKALI, ROLLED OATS, CHOCOLATE LIQUOR, BROWN SUGAR, CANOLA OIL, CAROB BEAN GUM, NATURAL FLAVOR, SEA SALT, SUNFLOWER LECITHIN, PECTIN, GUAR GUM, BAKING SODA, SALT, SOY LECITHIN

name: COFFEE COOKIE CRUMBLE
description: Inspired by an affogato, Coffee Cookie Crumble, is a coffee lover’s dream. We began with cold brew gelato made with fair trade Brazilian and Colombian coffee beans and sprinkled in dark chocolate chunks. From there, we added vanilla gelato, a chocolate coffee sauce and finally traditional Italian Amaretti Cookies for a unique Talenti twist.
ingredients: MILK, SUGAR†, CREAM, CHOCOLATE, EGG YOLKS, WATER, WHEAT FLOUR, CORN SYRUP†, SKIM MILK, DEXTROSE†, COCOA (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), PALM OIL, NATURAL FLAVOR, MILK FAT, COFFEE, COCOA BUTTER, VANILLA EXTRACT, EGG WHITES, SOY LECITHIN, CAROB BEAN GUM, CHOCOLATE (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), SUNFLOWER LECITHIN, PECTIN, LEMON JUICE CONCENTRATE, MOLASSES†, BAKING SODA, SALT, GUAR GUM, LEMON PEEL

name: COLD BREW COFFEE SORBETTO
description: Our Cold Brew Coffee Sorbetto is created by perfectly blending fair-trade Brazilian and Colombian cold brew coffee with everything but the milk. If this sorbetto was a coffee, we’d call it a South Americano.
ingredients: WATER, SUGAR, EGG YOLKS AND EGG WHITES, COCONUT OIL, ALMONDS, COFFEE EXTRACT CONCENTRATE, DEXTROSE, CAROB BEAN GUM,VANILLA EXTRACT

name: DARK CHOCOLATE CHERRY
description: This Layer was inspired by a cherry cordial and features the perfect pairing of dark chocolate and black cherry. We started with our Double Dark Gelato which features sophisticated hints of vermouth. Followed by chocolate flakes, a black cherry sauce, more Double Dark Gelato and a fifth layer of fudge truffles, this refined flavor is sure to please a crowd.
ingredients: MILK, SUGAR, CREAM, EGG YOLKS AND EGG WHITES, CHOCOLATE, COCOA PROCESSED WITH ALKALI, COCONUT OIL, DEXTROSE, WATER, CHERRY PUREE, CANOLA OIL, VERMOUTH, CHERRY JUICE CONCENTRATE, MILK FAT, COCOA BUTTER, WHEY, LEMON JUICE CONCENTRATE, VANILLA EXTRACT, CHOCOLATE PROCESSED WITH ALKALI, CAROB BEAN GUM, COCOA, SOY LECITHIN, SALT, NATURAL FLAVOR

name: DARK CHOCOLATE SORBETTO
description: Recipe #59
ingredients: WATER, SUGAR, COCOA PROCESSED WITH ALKALI, DEXTROSE, COCONUT OIL, EGG YOLKS, EGG WHITES, CHOCOLATE LIQUOR, CAROB BEAN GUM, SEA SALT, NATURAL FLAVOR, PECTIN

name: FUDGE BROWNIE GELATO
description: Fudge Brownie gelato. Real, gooey, perfect brownies blended into our dark chocolate gelato. And we added a swirl of rich, dark fudge because we clearly wanted to go all in on this pint.
ingredients: MILK, SUGAR, CREAM, EGG AND EGG YOLK, CHOCOLATE, DEXTROSE, COCOA (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), WHEAT FLOUR, PALM OIL, SKIM MILK, FRUCTOSE, BROWN SUGAR, CAROB GUM, COCOA, SOYBEAN OIL, SALT, NATURAL FLAVOR, SOY LECITHIN, CORN STARCH

name: HAZELNUT CHOCOLATE CHIP GELATO
description: Hazelnut combines with chocolatey chips and roasted hazelnut pieces to create this Clearly Talenti take on a classic. Hazelnut Chocolate Chip gelato: the clear choice if you’re sweet and nutty, and looking for your gelato doppelgänger.
ingredients: MILK, SUGAR, CREAM, HAZELNUTS, CHOCOLATE, DEXTROSE, MILK FAT, COCOA BUTTER, CAROB BEAN GUM, CHOCOLATE (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), VANILLA EXTRACT, XANTHAN GUM, SOY LECITHIN

name: LEMON BERRY PIE
description: Inspired by a classic summer dessert, this Layer pairs sweet and tart lemon gelato, all-American blueberries with pie crust pieces and graham cracker cookies for double the pie! We steeped lemon zest in fresh cream, milk and sugar to create a perfect lemon gelato.
ingredients: MILK, SUGAR†, CREAM, LEMON JUICE, WHEAT FLOUR, TAPIOCA SYRUP, WATER, COCONUT OIL, BLUEBERRIES, DEXTROSE†, EGG YOLKS, PALM OIL, NATURAL FLAVOR, WHEAT BRAN, WHOLE EGG, CAROB BEAN GUM, GUAR GUM, SALT, BAKING SODA, LEMON PEEL, WHEAT GERM, SOY LECITHIN, PECTIN, RED CABBAGE JUICE (COLOR)

name: MADAGASCAN VANILLA BEAN GELATO
description: Fresh milk, sugar and cream are slow cooked and the finest vanilla beans are imported from Madagascar to create a rich, one-of-a-kind taste that’s anything but plain vanilla.
ingredients: MILK, SUGAR, CREAM, DEXTROSE, VANILLA EXTRACT, SUNFLOWER LECITHIN, CAROB BEAN GUM, GUAR GUM, NATURAL FLAVOR, LEMON PEEL

name: MEDITERRANEAN MINT GELATO
description: Our Mediterranean Mint gelato uses real mint leaves steeped for 45 full minutes to get the perfect mint taste that is only amplified by the bittersweet chocolate flecks found throughout this iconic pint.
ingredients: MILK, SUGAR, CREAM, CHOCOLATE, DEXTROSE, MILK FAT, COCOA BUTTER, SUNFLOWER LECITHIN, CAROB BEAN GUM, NATURAL FLAVOR, GUAR GUM, CHOCOLATE (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), VANILLA EXTRACT, SOY LECITHIN, MINT LEAF EXTRACTIVES

name: MINT FUDGE COOKIE
description: In this Layer, our Mediterranean Mint Gelato is the star of the show. So, of course, we began with our Mediterranean Mint Gelato made with fresh mint leaves. We used chocolatey cookies for an extra crunch in our second layer and swirled in a third layer of fudge sauce. Next, we used even more Mediterranean Mint Gelato in the fourth layer and finished with chocolate cookie pieces in the final layer.
ingredients: MILK, SUGAR, CREAM, COCONUT OIL, WHEAT FLOUR, COCOA PROCESSED WITH ALKALI, SKIM MILK, WATER, ENRICHED WHEAT FLOUR (WHEAT FLOUR, NIACIN, REDUCED IRON,THIAMIN MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID), DEXTROSE, CHOCOLATE, CANOLA OIL, PALM OIL AND SOYBEAN OIL, BUTTER (CREAM, SALT), NATURAL FLAVOR, SUNFLOWER LECITHIN, SOY LECITHIN, CAROB BEAN GUM, DRIED CANE SYRUP, COCOA, GUAR GUM, BAKING SODA, SALT, CORN STARCH, VANILLA EXTRACT, MINT LEAF EXTRACTIVES

name: OLD WORLD EGGNOG GELATO
description: Made with fresh milk, sugar, cream, egg yolks, pure vanilla extract, and nutmeg, our Old World Eggnog gelato recipe proves that, eggnog is meant to be eaten with a spoon.
ingredients: MILK, SUGAR, CREAM, DEXTROSE, EGG YOLKS, CAROB GUM, VANILLA EXTRACT, NUTMEG, NATURAL FLAVOR

name: PACIFIC COAST PISTACHIO GELATO
ingredients: MILK, SUGAR, CREAM, PISTACHIOS, DEXTROSE, CAROB BEAN GUM, NATURAL FLAVOR, VANILLA EXTRACT

name: PEPPERMINT BARK GELATO
description: A white chocolate peppermint gelato and semisweet chocolatey flakes combine for our Peppermint Bark gelato that tastes like winter in a pint.
ingredients: MILK, SUGAR, CREAM, CHOCOLATE (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), DEXTROSE, COCOA BUTTER, COCONUT AND SOYBEAN OIL, VANILLA EXTRACT, CAROB GUM, SOY LECITHIN, NATURAL FLAVOR

name: PUMPKIN PIE
description: Pumpkin Pie Layers is the ultimate holiday dessert in jar! We began with an indulgent layer of pumpkin gelato, followed by a layer of pie crust pieces. We then added a layer of rich brown sugar sauce (the same one we used in our original pumpkin pie flavor). And lastly, another layer of pumpkin gelato then more pie crust pieces!
ingredients: MILK, SUGAR†, CREAM, WHEAT FLOUR, PUMPKIN, WATER, BUTTER, BROWN SUGAR†, COCONUT OIL, DEXTROSE†, TAPIOCA STARCH, EGG, SUNFLOWER LECITHIN, CINNAMON, NATURAL FLAVOR, CAROB BEAN GUM, SALT, CARROT POWDER (COLOR), NUTMEG, GUAR GUM, VANILLA EXTRACT

name: SEA SALT CARAMEL GELATO
ingredients: MILK, SKIM MILK, SUGAR, CREAM, EGG YOLK AND WHOLE EGG, CORN SYRUP, COCONUT OIL, DEXTROSE, COCOA (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), SEA SALT, CAROB BEAN GUM, VANILLA EXTRACT, SOY LECITHIN, NATURAL FLAVOR

name: STRAWBERRY HIBISCUS SORBETTO
description: Sweet strawberries and real hibiscus flowers are blended together for a perfectly sweet and tart dairy-free sorbetto. There is ¼ cup of real strawberries in each serving! For a pop of color, we finish with a beautiful hibiscus swirl to complete this delicious refreshing sorbetto.
ingredients: WATER, STRAWBERRIES, SUGAR, DEXTROSE, CORN SYRUP, LEMON JUICE, HIBISCUS POWDER, HIBISCUS FLOWER, CAROB BEAN GUM, LIME JUICE CONCENTRATE, PECTIN, VEGETABLE JUICE (FOR COLOR)

name: VANILLA CARAMEL SWIRL GELATO
description: Our Vanilla Caramel Swirl gelato is our simple vanilla bean gelato combined with our rich dulce de leche. It begs the question, “Where have you been all my life?”
ingredients: MILK, SUGAR, CREAM, SKIM MILK, DEXTROSE, VANILLA EXTRACT, CORN SYRUP, CAROB GUM, NATURAL FLAVOR, LEMON PEEL, VANILLA BEANS

name: VANILLA FUDGE COOKIE
description: Vanilla Fudge Cookie features two of our iconic gelato flavors! We started with our Talenti Double Dark Gelato on top, then created a layer of chocolate cookie chunks, followed by a fudge sauce. Next, we mixed in our Madagascan Vanilla Bean Gelato and finally, a fifth layer of chocolatey waffle cones to add a savory and sweet crunch.
ingredients: MILK, SUGAR, SKIM MILK, CREAM, WATER, COCONUT OIL, CORN SYRUP, WHOLE EGG AND EGG YOLK, COCOA PROCESSED WITH ALKALI, ENRICHED WHEAT FLOUR (WHEAT FLOUR, NIACIN, REDUCED IRON, THIAMIN MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID), DEXTROSE, PALM OIL AND SOYBEAN OIL, BAKING SODA, VANILLA EXTRACT, CAROB BEAN GUM, SUNFLOWER LECITHIN, SEA SALT, SOY LECITHIN, NATURAL FLAVOR, DRIED CANE SYRUP, COCOA, BUTTER (CREAM, SALT), GUAR GUM, CORN STARCH, SALT

name: Homemade Vanilla
description: Breyers® Homemade Vanilla ice cream is thick and smooth like it was just churned. It’s how homemade should taste, which makes it the perfect pairing to your favorite homemade treats. Try it with any one of our favorite recipes, like Rice Cereal Treat Ice Cream Sandwiches, Chocolate Chip Ice Cream Pies, or even a Banana Split Ice Cream Cake! Check out for more ideas!

name: Extra Creamy Vanilla
description: Breyers® Extra Creamy Vanilla is our creamiest vanilla. Fresh cream and sweet vanilla come together to make your favorite treat creamier than ever before! Add it to Brownie Bowl Sundaes, Hot Fudge Sundaes, or blend it into a Creamy Mojito Shake. Extra Creamy Vanilla makes them all extra dreamy.

name: Chocolate
description: Dig into a mouth-watering scoop of Breyers® Chocolate ice cream to find out why it's America's favorite. Rich, creamy ice cream with just the right amount of sweetness and real cocoa! Who can resist our Breyers® Chocolate ice cream? That fresh cream taste in Breyers® Chocolate ice cream is thanks in part to our partnerships with American farmers, who ensure the highest quality of dairy for our desserts.

name: Delights Creamy Chocolate
description: Now you can indulge without all the guilt! Who knew that a whole pint of Creamy Chocolate ice cream was 270 calories, and tasted delicious too...we did! That's because here at Breyers®, we have over 150 years of experience making mouth-watering ice cream.

name: Delights Mint Chip
description: Now you can indulge without all the guilt! Who knew that a whole pint of Mint Chip ice cream was 310 calories, and tasted delicious too...we did! That's because here at Breyers®, we have over 150 years of experience making mouth-watering ice cream.

name: Delights Vanilla Bean
description: Now you can indulge without all the guilt! Who knew that a whole pint of Vanilla Bean ice cream was 260 calories, and tasted delicious too...we did! That's because here at Breyers®, we have over 150 years of experience making mouth-watering ice cream.

name: French Vanilla
description: Ooo la la! It’s Breyers® French Vanilla ice cream! A classic twist on your favorite Breyers® vanilla. The signature taste of Breyers® French Vanilla was inspired by the traditional French custard, and is our richest, most indulgent Vanilla. It’s the perfect complement to delicious breakfast-style desserts, like French Toast a la Mode, French Vanilla Puff Pancakes, or a Fruit Salad Parfait.

name: OREO®
description: Breyers® vanilla and heaps of OREO® cookies? Yes please! If you’re anything like us, you love Breyers® vanilla and OREO® cookies. So why not combine your love into one tub with Breyers® OREO® Cookies & Cream? Rich, creamy vanilla goodness surrounds those chunks of 100% REAL OREO® cookies and will be sure to bring a smile to your face.

name: Vanilla Fudge Twirl
description: Rich fudge swirled through creamy smooth vanilla makes for a 'twirling' good time in Breyers® Vanilla Fudge Twirl! Twirl around in enjoyment!

name: CarbSmart™ Chocolate
description: Discover the Breyers® CarbSmart™ Chocolate treat! It's perfect when you want something sweet for dessert while still eating healthy!

name: Lactose Free Chocolate
description: Have a lactose sensitivity? No problem! Try our Breyers® Lactose Free Chocolate! It’s the same great chocolate, just without the lactose*! A creamy, delicious dessert made with real cocoa.

name: No Sugar Added Vanilla Chocolate Strawberry
description: Vanilla. Chocolate. Strawberry. All in one!? And with no sugar added? Oh my! The Breyers® take on the classic Neopolitan is the best of 3 worlds with the added bonus of no sugar added! Our Signature vanilla, chocolate and strawberry Breyers® come together in one delicious package. Whether one at a time or all three in a scoop, there’s something for everyone!

name: Raspberry Cheesecake Gelato Indulgences
description: Discover Breyers® Raspberry Cheesecake Gelato Indulgences ®. Get wrapped up in silky cheesecake gelato, luscious raspberry sauce and gourmet graham crumbles.

name: REESE'S
description: Breyers® joins forces with America’s favorite peanut butter chocolate candy to bring you Breyers® REESE'S Peanut Butter! Peanut butter Breyers® is loaded with chunks of 100% REAL REESE'S Peanut Butter Cups and a rich fudge swirl for a dessert that can’t be beat.

name: CarbSmart™ Almond Bar
description: Breyers® CarbSmart™ Vanilla & Almond Bar is low on carbs and big on taste! At 4g net carbs and 150 calories per serving, it is sure to satisfy any craving! Breyers® CarbSmart™ proves that fewer carbs doesn't mean less taste.

name: HEATH & Waffle Cone 2in1
description: Love HEATH bars? What about fudge-covered waffle cone? With Breyers® 2in1 you can treat yourself to both! Try our vanilla Breyers® loaded with pieces of real HEATH English Toffee Bar pieces, swirled together with chocolate Breyers® and fudge-covered waffle cone pieces. It’s sure to be your new favorite dessert. We hope you agree that our new HEATH Waffle Cone is top notch!

name: CarbSmart™ Vanilla Bar
description: Watching your grams of sugar or carbs? Try our Breyers® CarbSmart™ Vanilla Bars, with 140 calories, 5g net carbs, 5g sugars, and 3g fiber per serving+! Delicious vanilla Breyers® in a chocolatey shell – mm so good! Sometimes, you just need a treat that you can grab and go in the classic combination of vanilla and chocolate!

name: HEATH
description: Breyers® joins forces with one of your favorite candy bars to bring you Breyers® HEATH! Chunks of real HEATH Milk Chocolate English Toffee Bar are nestled in toffee-flavored Breyers® with a sweet caramel swirl for a dessert that can’t be beat.

name: CarbSmart™ Fudge Bar
description: Breyers® CarbSmart™ Fudge Bar is rich on chocolate taste but low on carbs! Now you can enjoy dessert even when you are trying to eat healthy! Breyers® CarbSmart™ proves that fewer carbs* doesn't mean less taste. Make sweeter family moments while keeping carb-watchers happy by the bar or by the scoop. Treat yourself to a scoop of Breyers® CarbSmart™ Fudge Bar—3 grams of net carbs+ and 60 calories per serving! +SEE NUTRITION FACTS FOR MORE INFORMATION +NET CARBS ARE CALCULATED BY SUBTRACTING TOTAL DIETARY FIBER AND SUGAR ALCOHOL FROM TOTAL CARBOHYDRATES
ingredients: MILK, WATER, MALTITOL SYRUP, POLYDEXTROSE, COCONUT OIL, DUTCHED COCOA (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), WHEY, GLYCERIN, CREAM, SOLUBLE CORN FIBER, VEGETABLE GUMS, GUAR, CAROB BEAN, MONO AND DIGLYCERIDES, ACESULFAME POTASSIUM, SUCRALOSE, NATURAL FLAVOR

name: Rocky Road
description: Deliciously gooey marshmallow swirled through rich chocolate Breyers® and real, chocolatey-covered almonds. Breyers® Rocky Road is the fastest road to fun! Love Breyers® chocolate ice cream? Well this dessert, made with rich cocoa will be sure to be your new favorite.

name: Cherry Vanilla
description: Take juicy cherries and add smooth and creamy Breyers® vanilla, for a delicious Breyers® Cherry Vanilla. Now that's a refreshingly delicious family-time dessert! Those chunks of juicy cherries are even 100% sustainably farmed and the great vanilla taste? It’s from the sustainable vanilla we source from Madagascar. Our vanilla is also certified by Rainforest Alliance, so you can feel good about helping farmers, while you enjoy your bowl! We believe that the quality of our ingredients makes delicious desserts.

name: Cookies & Cream
description: Take a milk and cookie break. Dive into Breyers® rich and creamy vanilla packed with scrumptious, cream-filled chocolate cookie pieces in Breyers® Cookies & Cream! That delicious vanilla taste mixed with chocolate cookies – what a combination!

name: Coffee
description: Enjoy Breyers® Coffee by the scoop and brew up good times! This delicious treat is made with fresh cream and rich, roasted Colombian coffee. Smooth and creamy, it’s a coffee lovers dream come true.

name: Extra Creamy Chocolate
description: Breyers® Extra Creamy Chocolate is our creamiest chocolate. Fresh cream and real cocoa come together to make your favorite treat creamier than ever before! Add it to Brownie Bowl Sundaes, Hot Fudge Sundaes, or blend it into a Creamy Chocolate Mojito Shake. Extra Creamy Chocolate makes them all extra dreamy.

name: Chocolate Truffle
description: It’s every chocolate-lover’s dream! Savor the creamy, delicious taste of Breyers® dark chocolate ice cream and pieces of dark chocolate truffles in every bite of Breyers® Chocolate Truffle!

name: Layered Dessert Peach Cobbler
description: Love peach cobbler topped with Breyers®? Then make sure you don't miss out on our Limited Edition Peach Cobbler Layered Dessert. We start with smooth Breyers® and stir in real buttery shortbread pieces between two layers of peach with peach pieces. The experience of peach cobbler topped with Breyers, all in one scoop!

name: Layered Dessert Brownie Cheesecake
description: Love brownie cheesecake? What about Breyers®? Now you can get both delicious desserts in just one scoop! We start with smooth cheesecake Breyers® and stir in real cheesecake pieces and surround it by two layers of chocolate with brownies.
